resources.string: We are a dedicated consultancy firm specializing in sending labor and students abroad. Our mission is to bridge the gap between dreams and reality by connecting individuals to global opportunities. With a strong focus on professionalism and quality, we aim to empower our clients to achieve their goals and realize their full potential.
"Thank you Shetab for your brilliant work and getting me an offer letter so quickly. Couldn't have done it without your tremendous support!"
"Shetab made my dream of getting into an undergrad program a reality, complete with a $5,000 scholarship. Many many thanks, Shetab ❤"

"I am overjoyed and extremely thankful to SHETAB for securing my admission to my dream university for an undergrad in CS along with a $20,000 scholarship. Their exceptional support made this incredible opportunity possible."

"I am extremely thankful to SHETAB for helping me get into my dream university for a PhD in CS, that too without a master's and without any publications! Their guidance made the impossible possible—thank you, SHETAB!"
We have hired a very selective pool of experts to help guide our clients with all their visa queries. Our diligence has allowed us to maintain an exceptionally high visa ratio.

Our experience in the European job markets sets us apart when it comes to guiding our clients in terms of securing their dream jobs in Europe. Our experts continue to help countless clients with their desired placements.

Our expertise in research is one of the key things that set us apart. We make sure to hire people with a heavy research background so that they can expertly guide our clients with research proposals and research articles.

We are amongst some of the few consultancy firms in the entire country that help clients secure full funding at some of the most prestigious universities in the world. Our clients have gotten into Ivy League universities like Harvard and Columbia.
We provide reliable job placement services for skilled and unskilled labor abroad. We assist with work permits, visas, and medical clearances.

We assist students in securing admissions for bachelors, masters, and PhD programs abroad. Our services include test preparation (GRE, GMAT, TOEFL, IELTS, SAT), securing scholarships, research paper writing assistance, and student visa processing.
We provide expert guidance and support for obtaining tourist visas to various destinations.
Must be at least 8 Character! Minimum 1 Capital Case, 1 Small Case, 1 Special Character and 1 digit!

We are a dedicated consultancy firm specializing in sending labor and students abroad. Our mission is to bridge the gap between dreams and reality by connecting individuals to global opportunities. With a strong focus on professionalism and quality, we aim to empower our clients to achieve their goals and realize their full potential.
Would love to hear all about it, maybe over coffee or a call sometime soon. Let me know when you\'re free!
I know you\'\'ve been ignored before by a woman you sent a message on Tinder, FB, WhatsApp etc. She refused to reply. Why? I\'\'ll reveal it to you.
How do I register for the app?
android:text="Open the app and click on the "Register" button on the login screen."
Open the app and click on the "Register" button on the login screen.
Fill in your details such as name, email, password, and phone number.
Click "Submit" and you will receive a verification email.
Verify your email to activate your account, and you’re ready to log in!
How do I apply for a visa using the app?
Navigate to the "Apply Visa" section in the app’s menu.
Choose the visa type and destination country.
Complete the application form by filling in required details such as passport number, personal information, and supporting documents.
Submit your application and you will receive a confirmation and application ID for tracking your status.
How can I check the progress of my visa application?
Go to the "Visa Progress Status" section in the app.
Enter your application ID or use the track my application option.
You will see the current progress of your application (e.g., pending, in process, approved, or rejected) along with estimated processing times.
Navigate to the "Client Feedback" section in the app.
Navigate to the "Client Feedback" section in the app.
You will be able to see feedback left by other clients.
To leave your feedback, click on "Give Feedback", rate the service, and write your comments.
Once submitted, your feedback will be reviewed and displayed in the feedback section.
What should I do if I can’t log in to my account?
Make sure you are using the correct email and password.
If you forgot your password, click on "Forgot Password?" on the login screen.
Enter your registered email and follow the instructions sent to your inbox to reset your password.
If the problem persists, contact our support team via the "Help & Support" section in the app for further assistance.
Work Hours: Office hours are mandatory from 10:00 AM to 06:00 PM, Sunday to Thursday. Unexcused lateness or absences will result in a proportional deduction from your salary.
Behavior Respect: Treat everyone with respect. No tolerance for harassment. Integrity: Always act ethically and honestly.
Communication Internal: Use email or internal chat for communication. External: Maintain professionalism with clients.
Equipment Use Company Property: Use company equipment responsibly.Internet: Use the internet for work-related activities only.
Annual Leave: You are entitled to 12 days of paid annual leave. The scheduling of your leave days will be subject to approval by your supervisor.

Sick Leave: Employees are eligible for up to 4 consecutive days of paid sick leave, requiring notification to their supervisor before their shift starts and a medical certificate if absent for more than two days.
Performance Reviews: Performance reviews are conducted annually. Feedback: Open to feedback and opportunities for growth.
Confidentiality Privacy: Keep company and client information private.Data Security: Follow data protection protocols.

Provident Fund: Your monthly salary will include a compulsory Provident Fund contribution, which is a retirement benefit scheme. Both you and the company will contribute a fixed amount of your basic salary to this fund.
Gratuity Benefit: Eligible for gratuity payment in accordance with the company’s policy after completing a minimum period of service.
Festival Bonus: You will be entitled to two festival bonuses each year, as per company policy.
Annual Company Trip: We organize a company trip every year to help employees relax and build team spirit. Participation is encouraged.
Public Holidays: You are entitled to all government holidays.
Policy Enforcement: Violating these policies may lead to disciplinary actions. We reserve the right to update these policies and will inform everyone of any changes.

Welcome to [Company Name]! By using our services, you agree to the following Terms & Conditions. Please read these terms carefully, as they govern your use of our visa processing services (for students, workers, and tourists) and IT/software development services.

By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms & Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with these terms, please refrain from using our services.
Visa Processing Services: Assisting individuals with visa applications for study, work, or tourism purposes.
IT/Software Development Services: Offering custom software development, support, and maintenance.
You must be at least 18 years old and legally able to enter into a binding contract to use our services. By using our services, you represent that you meet this eligibility requirement.
Provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information during the visa application process or when engaging our IT services.
Follow all applicable laws and regulations in relation to your visa application or project development.
Pay any fees or charges associated with the services in a timely manner.
Refrain from using our services for any unlawful or prohibited activities.

Application Assistance: [Company Name] provides assistance in preparing and submitting visa applications. However, the outcome of visa applications is determined solely by the relevant immigration authorities.
No Guarantee of Success: While we strive to offer expert guidance, we cannot guarantee that your visa application will be approved.

Processing Time: Visa processing times vary depending on the country and the type of visa being applied for. We will provide you with an estimated processing time, but we are not responsible for any delays caused by government authorities.
Project Scope: Before commencing any software development project, we will agree on the scope, timeline, and costs with you. Any changes to the scope of work may result in additional charges.
Intellectual Property: Upon completion and payment of the project, all intellectual property rights related to the software developed will be transferred to you, unless otherwise agreed in writing.
Service Availability: We aim to ensure that our software services are available and functional at all times, but we cannot guarantee uninterrupted access due to factors beyond our control.
You agree to pay the agreed-upon fees for our services, as outlined in your service agreement or invoice.
Refunds: Visa processing fees and IT service fees are non-refundable once services have been rendered, unless otherwise agreed upon.
Late Payments: Any late payments may incur additional charges or penalties.
For Visa Processing: You may cancel your visa application service at any time, but fees paid are non-refundable once the process has started.

For IT Services: Either party may terminate a software development contract if the other party fails to meet agreed terms or obligations. Termination must be provided in writing. Upon termination, all work completed up to the termination date must be paid for.
Delays or failures in visa approval or processing, as these are the sole responsibility of government authorities.
Any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our IT services, including software bugs, system outages, or security breaches.
Any loss, damage, or failure that arises from your failure to provide accurate information or adhere to legal requirements.

All services provided by SheTab are on an "as-is" and "as-available" basis. We do not make any warranties, express or implied, including warranties of accuracy, reliability, or fitness for a particular purpose.

All content, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, provided by SheTab is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or modify any content from our website or services without our prior written consent.

These Terms & Conditions shall be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of [Country]. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Bangladesh.

We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms & Conditions at any time without prior notice. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically. Continued use of our services following any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
